headline.main: NFL Stadium Supporters in LA Suburb File Ballot Paperwork
headline.print_headline: NFL Stadium Supporters in LA Suburb File Ballot Paperwork

docs.snippet: Organizers behind a proposed stadium for the Oakland Raiders and the San Diego Chargers in a Los Angeles suburb filed paperwork Wednesday to bring their plan before voters....
docs.lead_paragraph: Organizers behind a proposed stadium for the Oakland Raiders and the San Diego Chargers in a Los Angeles suburb filed paperwork Wednesday to bring their plan before voters.

headline.main: Dozens killed in attack on Syrian security building
headline.sub: Dozens killed in attack on Syrian security building

docs.snippet: Amateur video appears to show insurgents attacking a Syrian government security building in Aleppo. Rough cut (no reporter narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: Amateur video appears to show insurgents attacking a Syrian government security building in Aleppo. Rough cut (no reporter narration).

headline.main: South Korea's Park Says Attack on U.S. Ambassador to Seoul an 'Attack on Alliance'
headline.print_headline: South Korea's Park Says Attack on U.S. Ambassador to Seoul an 'Attack on Alliance'

docs.snippet: South Korean President Park Geun-hye said on Thursday a knife attack on the U.S. ambassador to Seoul was an "attack on the South Korea-U.S. alliance", Park's office quoted her as saying from the United Arab Emirates....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Korean President Park Geun-hye said on Thursday a knife attack on the U.S. ambassador to Seoul was an "attack on the South Korea-U.S. alliance", Park's office quoted her as saying from the United Arab Emirates.

headline.main: Suns Have Big 3rd-Quarter Rally, Beat Magic 105-100
headline.print_headline: Suns Have Big 3rd-Quarter Rally, Beat Magic 105-100

docs.snippet: Brandon Knight had 28 points and seven assists in his best game for Phoenix, and the Suns overcame a 15-point deficit to beat the Orlando Magic 105-100 on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brandon Knight had 28 points and seven assists in his best game for Phoenix, and the Suns overcame a 15-point deficit to beat the Orlando Magic 105-100 on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Maduro Rejects Speculation He'll Suspend Venezuela Elections

headline.main: Major League Soccer Says Reaches New Labor Deal With Players
headline.print_headline: Major League Soccer Says Reaches New Labor Deal With Players

docs.snippet: Major League Soccer and its players reached an "agreement in principle" on a new collective bargaining agreement on Wednesday to avoid a work stoppage two days before the 20th MLS season opens, MLS chief Don Garber said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Major League Soccer and its players reached an "agreement in principle" on a new collective bargaining agreement on Wednesday to avoid a work stoppage two days before the 20th MLS season opens, MLS chief Don Garber said.

headline.main: Pacers Take Easy Rout in Getting Past Knicks 105-82
headline.print_headline: Pacers Take Easy Rout in Getting Past Knicks 105-82

docs.snippet: George Hill scored a season-high 21 points, and Rodney Stuckey added 17 to help Indiana rout the struggling Knicks 105-82 on Wednesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: George Hill scored a season-high 21 points, and Rodney Stuckey added 17 to help Indiana rout the struggling Knicks 105-82 on Wednesday night.

headline.main: Dominican Republic Temporarily Closes Consulates in Haiti
headline.print_headline: Dominican Republic Temporarily Closes Consulates in Haiti

docs.snippet: The Dominican Republic has announced the temporary closure of five of its consulates in neighboring Haiti because of security concerns....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Dominican Republic has announced the temporary closure of five of its consulates in neighboring Haiti because of security concerns.
